261a3: par 'gyur zhing / rang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang / gnod pa
261a4: chen por mthong ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni/ bdag dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don yongs su grub par
261a5: mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i yi dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yed mchen
261a6: po bcu po 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi rje nyid bdag gi dbang du gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ston pa mngon sum du gyur du lags kyang / sems can
261a7: dge ba'i rtsa ba chud ngul la dag/ kye ma yid mtshan po bcu po 'di dag ni lcogs par dka'o snyam du/ bdag la the tsom tha ma yid gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang /
261a8: sdug bsngal ba dang / phung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid la sman gdags pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag

261b1: gas yad mchen po bcu po gang dag blangs pa'i yid mchen po bcu po 'di dag la/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur blta na/ bcom ldan 'das bad gi 'den pa'i
261b2: tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig/ lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig/ des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di len par gyur cig/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gis tshig
261b3: de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas/ bar skad las lha'i sgra grag par gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de mnos nas/ lha mo de de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i
261b4: byin gyi rlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas rmad du byung ba'i tshe 'phrul de yang mthong / lha'i sgras mnos pa de yang thos nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tsom med
261b5: cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo dpal 'phreng dang mi 'bral zhing 'grogs par smon lam btab bo// 'khor de thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to//
261b6: de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar smon lam chen po gsum btab po// gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'dis sems can dpag tu ma mchis
261b7: bdag la sman btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa 'chos rtogs pa thob par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
261b8: ni bdag gi smon lam chen po dang po lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs pa de thob nas kyang ngal ba dang / yongs su skyob ma mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur

262a1: cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gnyis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de yang lus dang srog la yang mi lta bar/ dam pa'i chos bsrung
262a2: bdang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'debs
262a3: sa/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng gi smon lam chen po yul che ba gsum po 'di dag lung ston pa mdzad de/ lha mo 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad ni nam mkha
262a4: khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud do/ / lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang / smon lam chen po 'di gsum gyi khongs su
262a5: 'dus shing / khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud de/ smon lam chen po gsum po de dag ni de ltar yul che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
262a6: bcom ldan 'das 'di la smon lam chen po'i yul bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus padag zhi chos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod la de bzhin
262a7: gshegs pas gnang gis/ khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gang ga
262a8: glang gi byam snyeng gang lags pa dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i smon lam chan pa gcig gi khongs su 'dus shing langs su chud de/ bcom ldan 'das dam par

262b1: chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul che ba lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo legs so// legs so// lha mo khyod ni shes rab zab
262b2: pa ste/ thabs kyis yongs su bskos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no// lha mo sems can gang dag khyod kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te/ yun ring po nas sangs rgyas du ma la dge bal
262b3: rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa yin no/ / lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa/ ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
262b4: rnams kyis kyang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa de nyid bshad do// 'chad do// 'chad par 'gyur ro// lha mo nga yang ba ltar mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas/ dam pa'i chos
262b5: yongs su gzung ba bstan pa rnam pa du mar ston te/ lha mo de ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa/ ngas rnam pa du mar bshad kyang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan rnams kyi
262b6: mtha' 'am zur thug pa med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la yang mtha' 'am/ mu thug pa med do// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs
262b7: su 'dzin pa ni de ltar phan yon che'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa
262b8: gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// lha mod de'i dus la bab par shes na/ khyed spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas/ bcom ldan

263a1: 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
263a2: pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ 'chags pa 'dus kyi tshe'i sprin chen po'i ne
263a3: dog mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang / rin po che mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'chab kyi
263a4: spun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / ye shes rin po che'i rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe chab kyi phung po chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
263a5: rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas de las ni/ gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya la kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / dbyibs sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing / 'khor gling phran bye ba brgya phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung
263a6: ngo / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ theg pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa'i 'byung khungs dang / skye gnas su gyur pa de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad
263a7: dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug thams cad dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i' bde ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon
263a8: ma myong ba/ gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni khur chen po bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lags te/ bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chab kyi phung po chen po

263b1: rgya mtsho dang / ri mang po thams cad dang gnas pa dang / rtswa dang / shing dgel ba dang / sman dang / le thog dang / nags rgyal thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi rten bgyid de/ bcom
263b2: ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po khur chen po bzhi po 'di dag gi rten bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sa chen po bas kyang
263b3: ches khur chen po bzhi khyer ba lags so/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / thos pa dang mi ldan la/ chos can ma lags pa
263b4: rnams/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dge la sbyor ba ni sa chen po bas kyang sa khur chen po khyer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig
263b5: nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni/ sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa
263b6: ni sa chen po bas kyang chos khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen po la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni/ sa chen po zas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba
263b7: lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ khur chen po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags
263b8: te/ sa chen po zas kyang ches rten du gyur pa dang / sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba dang / khur mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du gyur pa dang / byams pa

264a1: bgyis pa dang / snying rje can dang / sman par 'tshol ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / chos kyis 'jig rten gyi ma zhes bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni rin po che sna bzhi'i 'byung
264a2: gnas lags te/ sna bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che rin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas chung ba bag ge 'byung gnas dang //
264a3: rin po che de bas kyang chung ba dag gi 'byung ba gnas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
264a4: kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po che'i mchog chen po rin po che thams cad kyi dam par gyur pa bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i
264a5: bshes gnyen rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la brten nas/ sems can rnams kyis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi khe rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan
264a6: thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par
264a7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chos mthon po thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten
264a8: nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po che thams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshar smad du byung ba'i rin po che chen po bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung

264b1: gnas shes bgyi ba de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dag sa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan
264b2: 'das dam pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ngo bo nyid dam pa'i chos lags so//
264b3: bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol
264b4: tu phyin pa rnams lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sems can gang dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyi
264b5: ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su btong bas kyang yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pa rnams// /
264b6: dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can
264b7: de dag ni dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / lus dang / pha/ dang yid kyi las yongs su dag pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na spyod lam gyis kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par
264b8: bgyid de/ de dag de lta de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas/ dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems

265a1: can gang dag bzod pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni/ de dag gis de la spros brgyad de/ gtsang bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang / bzod
265a2: pi'i stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs su sbyin par bgyid de/ thun bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag yongs su smin par brtsis pas/ dam pa chos la
265a3: gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su smin par bgyi pa'i sems can de dag ni sems mazhum zhing la
265a4: lo ma mchis pa dang / 'dun pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas/ yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na rang gi spyod lam bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su spen
265a5: par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyid pas/ dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag
265a6: bsam gtan gyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par
265a7: bgyid de/ tha na bgyis nas yun ring du lags pa dang / smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyud pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis
265a8: bas/ dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bgyi pa'i sems can

265b1: de dag ni/ sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la le lo ma mchis par lung ston pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/
265b2: tha na bzo dra'i gnas chen po dag du yang / de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas/ dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i
265b3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom
265b4: ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so//
265b5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
265b6: ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
265b7: 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
265b8: kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa des ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i tshes yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ yan lag gsum yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang /

266a1: srog dang / longs spyod rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi mi'amatha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ rga ba dang / nab
266a2: 'che ba dang bral ba/ mi shigs pa/ rtag pa brtan pa/ zhi ba/ ther zug pa/ 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs
266a3: kyi ba'am/ rigs kyi bu mo srog yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul pa gnas pa/ 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ 'chi 'pho dang bral ba mtha' yas pa/ rtag pa/
266a4: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongs su gtong bas ni/ sems can thams cad kyis
266a5: mchod pa/ 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa/ bas par mi 'gyur ba/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rtag par rgyun mi 'chad cing rtag tu gnas
266a6: pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs
266a7: su gtong bas ni/ yon tan shin tu smad du byung ba gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung ston par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
266a8: zhig dam pa'i tshes rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bye zhing gnyis su gyur la/ sde sder chad de/ phyogs phyogs su gyes nas/ rtsod par

266b1: gyur pa na/ g.yom mchis shing bya rgyu ma mchis la/ sgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ chos can gyi phyogs la 'jug par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das
266b2: rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad las lung bstan pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de ltar brtson
266b3: 'brus chen po lags pa snyam pa dag bskyed de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan
266b4: 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni rton pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad
266b5: de/ lha mo de de bzhin te/ lha mo dam pi'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ brtson 'grus chen po yin no// lha mo dper na/ mi stobs dang ldan pas gnad du mi zag par bsnun du zin kyang snang
266b6: bar 'gyur zhing nang sbed par byed do/ / lA mo de bzhin du dam pi'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chung ngu zin kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan skyed la smre sngags 'don par byed do// lha mo
266b7: ngas ni bdud sdig can la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ji ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan skyed la smre sngags 'don par byed pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar mya ngan skyed pa dang /
266b8: de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed pa'i dge ba'i chos gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo // lha mo dper na ba lang gi mchog khyu mchog gis ni 'di ltar 'phang mtho' ba dang / chu zheng gis ba lang gi tshogs

267a1: thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mngon par brjed cing yang dag par mngon par brjed do// lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ das pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang chung ngu zin kyang / 'di ltar rgyas pa
267a2: dang / rgya chen por gyur pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba 'chos thams cad zil gyis gnon to// lha mo dper na re'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang /
267a3: bas ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mngon par lhag ger 'dug go/ lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing phan gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i
267a4: chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas/ theg pa chen po pa theg pa lag sar du zhugs pa/ lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis
267a5: gnon na/ gzhan dag gi lta ji smos te/ lha mo de bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par
267a6: gzed bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ dgod par bya'o// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// de ltar 'bras bu che'o// de ltar phan yon che'o//
267a7: lha mo gal te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang / lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang /
267a8: phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mtha' 'ab mu thug par mi 'gyur ro// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan no// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba/

267b1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa/ ngas bstan pa/ de khyod kyis bshad pa spobs par gyis shig/ de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis bcom ldan 'das 'a legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das
267b2: kyis bskul ba mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos shes bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
267b3: 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o// bcoM ldan das te/ nye dper na
267b4: klung chen po bzhi ni mtshom dros pa las 'byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams
267b5: cad kyang theg pa chen po las 'byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das dper na/ sa bon gi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten
267b6: cings chen po la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
267b7: 'das pa'i dge ba'i tshes gang lags pa thams cad dang de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la brten cing / theg pa chen po la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de/
267b8: lags pas/ theg pa chen po la gnas shing / theg pa chen po yongs su bzung na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i cho

268a1: thams cad kyang / rten cing gnas te/ yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos nub pa dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba dang /
268a2: rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnas drug po de da dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing brtags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drug pa de dag kyang / theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lags
268a3: so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po gnas pa nyid ni dam
268a4: pi'i chos gnas pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni/ theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po
268a5: nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig ste/ yi ge'i 'bru ni tha dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das
268a6: 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi bslab pa lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par
268a7: rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di ltar 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i
268a8: cho ga'i tshul khrims kyi phung po lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nyan thos

268b1: dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni ma mchis kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du/ nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu
268b2: 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la skabs su mchi ba lags te/ bco ma
268b3: ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
268b4: kyang 'du byed thams cad la mi bzad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dper na/ gshed mas ral gyi gzas pa bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta
268b5: lags pas de dag kyang nges par byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabs su gyur pa ni skyabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
268b6: 'das ji ltar sems can skyabs ma mchis pa rnams gang dang gang gis 'jigs skrag pa'i 'jigs skrag pa de dang de las 'byung ba tshol ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
268b7: rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang 'jigs pa de mchis te/ 'jigs pa des skrag pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar khas len
268b8: pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang /

269a1: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sgrubamabs pa yang mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ bsten par bgyi ba'i lhag
269a2: ma dang bcas pa lags te/ des na de dag ni dag pa ma lags/ las mthar phyin pa ma lags te/ de dag gi bgyi ba mang lags so// de dag gi spang bar brtse ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/
269a3: dag ma spangs pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di na
269a4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes
269a5: pas/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
269a6: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
269a7: sangs rgyas rnams ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan
269a8: bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/

269b1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas/ spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad spangs shang mchog tu yongs su dag
269b2: pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa/ yongs su ma dag pa chos can lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
269b3: 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
269b4: sangs rgyas rnams ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang kyangan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags
269b5: so/ / bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtha'/ dbugs byin ba rjes su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang /
269b6: bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ni 'di
269b7: gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho dang / yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ni nyingad mtshams
269b8: sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'bo ni dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /

270a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang thob pa dang / yid kyi lus rnams lags te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis las
270a2: rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho'i dbang du bgyis te/ bdag gi skye bzad do snyam du/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das da ltar lhag ma dang
270a3: bcas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brten nas/ bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa bsten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so//
270a4: byis pa so so'i skye bo dang / lha dang mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang / slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang / bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba/ sngon ma bgyis pa de pangs
270a5: pa la brten nas/ bya ba byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba ni dgra
270a6: btsem pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam du/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang
270a7: sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam pa'i shes pa de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ma lags/ skye ba thams
270a8: cad yongs su 'tshal ba las byung ba yang ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa

270b1: dang / skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su ma 'tshal ba yang mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag ni rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /
270b2: kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gnas kyis yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
270b3: laganas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pi'i gnas kyi sa dang / sred pe'i 'dod chags lag nas pa'i gnas kyi sa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas kyis shing de dag gis nyon mongs
270b4: pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad skyed lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i
270b5: gnas kyis thog ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag gi nang na stobs che ba gang lags pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
270b6: cad kyi gzhir gyur pa/ ma rig pa'i gnas kyis stobs che ba'i grangs sam/ cha 'am/ bgrang ba'am/ dpe' 'am// rgyur yang mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ma rig pa'i gnas kyis
270b7: ni stobs che ba lags te/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pi'i sa zhes kyang bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ bdud sdig can ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du gtogs kyang / 'di ltar
270b8: gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / 'khor dang / dbang phyug gis gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams zil gyis gnon to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa'i gnas kyis//

271a1: sred pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa zhes bgyi bas kyang / gnas kyis bzhi po 'di dag zil gyis gnon te/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa rnyed kyi/ rten du gyur pa
271a2: dang / nyon mongs pa bzhi dang yang yun ring po nas lhan cig gnas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pas rje ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags
271a3: te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni stobs che ba lags so// po sa tha gsor nag ben/ lan pa'i rgyan gyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i sred pa gsum 'byung ba de
271a4: bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i rgyan gyis zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
271a5: dbang thob pa rnams kyi yid kyi lus gsum 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni/ sa gsum po 'di dag du yid kyi lus gsum po 'di dag 'byung ba dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i
271a6: las mngon par 'a grub pa'i rten lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rkyen ma mchis na rkyen 'byung ste/ de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni yid kyi lus gsum po rnams dang / zag pa ma mchis
271a7: pa'i las kyi rkyen lags pa'i slad du srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas par gnas kyis dang / ming 'dra ba lags so// de lta lags kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / las thun mong ba
271a8: ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni/ gnas kyis bzhi po dag las tha dad pa kho na lags te/ yongs su grol ba'i sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sas spang bar bgyi ba dang / de bzhin

271b1: gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni gnas
271b2: kyis bzhi spangs kyang / zag pa zad pa la dbang ba'i stobs kyang mi 'thob/ mngon sum du yang mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das zag pa zad pa zhes bgyi ba de ni/ ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i tshig
271b3: bla dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sred pa tha ma par gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
271b4: kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sas bsgribs shing chod la/ yongs su dkris te ldongs par bgyis pas/ chos de dang / de dag rab tu ma 'tshal cing mi rtogs so// bcom ldan 'das chos de dang
271b5: de dag ma 'tshal cing ma mthong bas/ spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dang de dag mi spangs shing byang par me bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag sa spangs shing / byang
271b6: b.ram bgyis pas bcom ldan 'das de dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni
271b7: rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa' chos can na ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan
271b8: pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad las rnam par grol

272a1: ba ni ma lags pa dang / rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags
272a2: kye/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so//
272a3: sdug bsngal 'gag pa mngon sum du ba gyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal
272a4: yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par
272a5: khro ba'i lam bsgoms pa skrag ma dang bcas pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lagagi mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag
272a6: na mya ngan pas 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / sdug bsngal
272a7: 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyis pa dang / sdug bsngal 'geg par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pas bcom zhing / rtag tu na pa'i 'jig
272a8: rten du rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / bsil ba'i dngas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni slob pa ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi skyob pa dang /

272b1: skyabs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bzang ngan du 'byed pa'i chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ma lags kyi// bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das
272b2: pa thob/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob// bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i slad
272b3: dror/ bcom ldan 'das de la lags pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni ro gcig ste/ 'di ltar rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i rer ro mtshungs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la
272b4: la dag ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar
272b5: romatshungs pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ma spangs shing / ma sbyangs pas ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma spangs
272b6: shing / ma sbyangs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de dag ma spangs shing / ma sbyangs pas/ chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das
272b7: bsad ma thob cing / mngon sum du ma bgyes par gyur pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni bsgom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon
272b8: mongs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de las ni sems kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / zhe gnas kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / lhag mthong gi nye ba'i

273a1: tsa mongs pa dang / bsams na pa tsun mangs pa dang / ting nga 'dun stan mangs pa dang / rnams par 'jug nyin mongs pa dang / rnam 1 nyon mangs pa dang /
273a2: pi'i nye ba banyan mongs pa dang / 'bras bu'i nye pi nyon mongs pa dang / rtogs pa nye ba nyan mongs pa dang / stobs kyi nyaba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'byung lags pa/
273a3: bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang / ma rig po'i gnas kyis
273a4: las 'byung lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang / gzhi dang rkyen lags so// bcom ldan 'das kun nas ldang
273a5: ba gang lags pa de dag ni skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems
273a6: dang mi ldan pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom zhing spang bar bgyi
273a7: bi'i chos de dag thams cad kyi gni dang / rten ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang /
273a8: sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das sal rten cing / sal gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sa chen po tshig

273b1: shig la mi gda' bar gyur te/ ma mchis par gyur na ni/ sa ban gyi rnam pa gang ca lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / ga gal ba dang / sman dang / nags chal da dag zhums du dkyang cag dun nam
273b2: mi gda' bar gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes
273b3: kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang / ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la rten cing ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma
273b4: rig pa'i gnas kyis spangs shing / sbyangs te ma mchis par gyur na ni/ spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom
273b5: par brtse ba de dag thams cad kyang spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad spangs shing / sangs rgyas
273b6: kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang ge'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa rnyed bsnyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa brnyes
273b7: te/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad gzigs pa dang / skyon thams cad spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ chos thams cad la mnga'
273b8: sbyar ba mang gshegs nas/ dab rtse ba zadang// tshangs par spyad pa bsnyen to// bya byas so// di la bu'i de las gzhan sa shes so zhes sa ga'i sgra spags par ma da// bcom ldan 'das

274a1: sgra lags pas de bzhin gshes pa rnams kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di ni nges pa'i don lags te/ don 'di ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bgyi ba yang lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las
274a2: gzhan mi shes sogs bgyi ba'i ye shes la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rgyal ba/ bla na ma mchis pas bdud bzhi bcom ste/ lam pa
274a3: mdzad nas/ chos kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad kyis blta bar bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes te/ shes bya'i sa thams cad la thogs
274a4: bam ma ris pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa na/ 'di las lhag par bya ba 'am/ rtogs par bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang dag par gzigs te/ stobs bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan zhing / mi 'jigs
274a5: pi'i sa bla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag par gshegs te/ shes bya thams cad la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas/ 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes brtse ba'i ye
274a6: shes kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do/ / bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las rgal ba/ de ma thag tu rnam par grol ba dag gis bde ba nyams
274a7: sa myong ba rnams ni/ 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las yongs su grol gyis/ bdag gis ni phyin chad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// snyam du yang dag par
274a8: mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta ba nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi btogs nas/ dbugs byin pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa

274b1: la so sor rtog go/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rtogs nas kyang / sa de la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par/ bdag gis ni 'di
274b2: ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par gyur to snyam du 'tshal to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs
274b3: rgyas kyi theg pa rnams ni/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'dra ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das
274b4: de ltar na theg pa gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na'i grangs su mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig rtogs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro//
274b5: bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba de ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla sa lags so// bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings shes bgyi
274b6: bde ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgra'i rtogs pa'i mtha' ni/ theg pa gcig pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma
274b7: lags/ chos kyi sku yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg ga gi mtha' lags so/
274b8: bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi mtha' zhes bgyi ba de ni/ theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyar ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dus kyi

275a1: mtha' mches pa la gnas pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ri 'amatha'i mur thug par gnas pa
275a2: slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten la sman pa'i slad du/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus kyi mtha' mchis pa 'thugs dam mnga' ba ma lags te/
275a3: kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dus kyi mthar med par yi dam bcas pa'i sems can/ a la la zhes mchi ba dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
275a4: pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ / kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir chos mi zad pa dang / chos rtag pa dang / chos brtan pa dang / skyabs kyi sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag kyang /
275a5: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra pa com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
275a6: ni skyabs ma mchis pa dang / skyob pa ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na/ phyi mi mthar thug par skyabs mi zad pa dang / skyabs rtag pa dang / skyabs brtan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos shes
275a7: bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa tshig bla dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun zhes bgyi pa de ni/ theg pa gsum po'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'as/
275a8: sbubs 'di gnyis na/ de'i yan lag gi skyabs gas bgyis/ skyabs kyi rab ma lags so// de ci'i srang du zheng/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa 'chos kyang / chos kyi skye rtogs

275b1: pi mtha' lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i pha rol na theg pa gcig ga lam bstan pa 'chos kyis ni bgyi bcu yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das thag pa gsum pa 'tshogs kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas
275b2: pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchis pa dang / 'byung ba'i thabs tshol ba dang / slob pa dang / bgyi ba dang bcas pa dang / bla na med pe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa lags so//
275b3: bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ skyabs 'di gnyis ni skyabs kyi rab ma lags te/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs
275b4: pas btul ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba na/ chos nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad pas/ chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang skyabs su mchi ste/
275b5: bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyirgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad pas// skyabs su mchi ba gnyis la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi
275b6: ba ni/ chos nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad pas mchi bar bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba ni/ skyabs su mchi ba yang dag pa logs so//
275b7: bcom ldan 'das skyabs su mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag par na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi zhes bgyi ba'i mtha' legs par khong du chud par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
275b8: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags/ skyabs gnyis po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid skyabs gsum lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/

276a1: bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bu mchog gi gsung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i sgra so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa
276a2: lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mos pa ji lta ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas/ theg pa gnyis po thabs kyi bsgrub pas bsgrubs pa de dag kyang / theg pa chen po bdag nyid kyi srad du lags
276a3: so/ / bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di gnyis kyi ming ni ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par na/ 'di la theg pa gcig po ni theg pa yang dag pa lags te/ theg pa gsum yang dag par
276a4: 'dra'o/ / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa/ thog mar mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa gcig pus ni gnas kyis de snyed cig spong bar 'gyur ro// bcom
276a5: ldan 'das shes pa de gcig pus yongs su 'tshal ba la sogs pa yon tan bzhi po rnams mngon sum du bgyid par 'gyur zhing / don bzhi po dag nyid chos nyid kyis shin tu so sor rtogs par 'gyur
276a6: ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa la/ shes pa bzhi 'pho ba dang / dmigs pa bzhi 'pho ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa rdo rje lta bu ni mi 'pho
276a7: bi'i chos can lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyis spong ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa dang po ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lags te/
276a8: bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa rnam pa gnyis kyis gnas kyis spong ba ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

276b1: rgyas rnams ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs spong lags so//
276b2: bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'byed pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes shes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pi'i bden pa 'tshal ba dang pan
276b3: mthar phyin pa shes pa ma lags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i don de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
276b4: thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan tshad mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lag gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i
276b5: rmad du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bgyi ba de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden
276b6: ma lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnam kyi yonatan ma lags te/ bden pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thog mar mngon par
276b7: rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par mkhyen la so sor rtogs nas/ de mngon par mkhyen pa'i 'og tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su bcug pa'i 'jig rten
276b8: la bstan cing btags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa ni zab cing phra la brtags pa ste/ khong du chud par dka'

277a1: zhing / brtag mi nus la/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma 'gas te/ mkhas shing 'dzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags so// de ci skad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das zab mo bstan
277a2: pa bshad pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lags te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
277a3: cad kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa 'di'i gnas lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i
277a4: gnas zab pas na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don yang zab cing pra la bdags pad/ ste/ rtogs par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing 'dzangs pas rig pa dang /
277a5: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs kyi mthas dkris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la the tshom ma mchis pa de
277a6: ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la yang the tshom ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi yid de bzhin gshegs
277a7: pi'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar phyin pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad
277a8: pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la yid ches shing dang de/ mos pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis ni rig par dka' zhing rtogs par dga' ba

277b1: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa dang / bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags so//
277b2: bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad par bgyi ba mchis pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang / btags pa tshad mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na//
277b3: bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal kyang / sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par thams cad
277b4: mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgom par mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 'khor ba la yang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa
277b5: mchis so/ / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa yang mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad par bgyi ba ma mchis pa gang lags
277b6: pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang / brtags pa dag dpag tu ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyis bsal kyang
277b7: zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / zin
277b8: pi'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgom par nus pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa de dag ni/

278a1: 'phags pa bden pa rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bstan/
278a2: pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags so// nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rab 'bring
278a3: tha mi'i chos rtogs pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rtogs pa'i ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
278a4: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
278a5: rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongs su mkhyen/ bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'du ba'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams
278a6: cad ni spangs/ / bcom ldan 'das yid kyi phung po thams cad 'gog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad/ 'gog pa ni mngon sum du mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos chung gzon
278a7: pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku thog/ ma chi 'i dus nas mchis pa ma bgyis pa/ ma skyes pa/ mibs pa/ bas pa ma mchis pa/
278a8: rtag pa brtan pa/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas ngas par grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa/ grol bar shes pa/ bsam gyis

278b1: mi khyab pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dang ldan pa ni/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi sku nyon mongs
278b2: bi'i sbubs nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i shes pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
278b3: po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngon ma mthong ma rtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
278b4: snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs dang / tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas
278b5: shes pa rnams kyis stong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas shing / grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las
278b6: 'das pa snyed dag gis mi stong pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la ni nyan thos chen po dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid
278b7: ches pas 'jug par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa bzhi po dag la 'jug pa lags so// bcom
278b8: ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad sngon ma mthong / sngon ma rtogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs

279a1: su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do/ / nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'joms pa/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad kyang bsgoms so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags
279a2: pi bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa gsum ni mi rtag pa lags so/ / bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan
279a3: nyid du gtogs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so// gang mi rtag pa de ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan
279a4: 'das gang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can de ni/ mi bden pa dang mi rtag pa lags te/ skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa dang / sdug
279a5: bsngal kun 'byung ba bden pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yang dag par ni mi bden pa dang / mi rtag pa lags te/ skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
279a6: 'di la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lags so// gang rtag pa de ni
279a7: mi slu ba'i chos can lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang mi slu ba'i chos can de ni bden pa dang / rtag pa dang / skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden
279a8: pa nyid ni yang dag par na/ bden pa dang / rtag pa dang / skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las 'das pa/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden

279b1: pani bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i spyad yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ dmus long gzugs la la mi nus pa dang / bu btsa' bar
279b2: gnas na mchis pa'i byis pa dgur bdun lags pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la lha mi nus pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa yang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam
279b3: par shes pa'i yul yang ma lags/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes par yul yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byis pas so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa zhes pa kyi
279b4: ba de ni/ mtha' gnyis la lta ba'i phyin ci log pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zhes bgyi ba da ni/ shes pa dag pa'i tshig
279b5: dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das mtha' gnyis su lta ba zhes bgyi ba de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen pi kyims rgya po tog pa dag gi tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan
279b6: 'das 'di gnyis ni mthar lta ba zhes bgyi ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'du byed rnams la mi rtag par ltan/ de ni de'i chad par lta ba ma
279b7: lags pa/ de ni de'i yang dag par grwa ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te mya ngan las 'das pa la rtag par ldan/ da ni de'i rtag par la ba ma lags te/ don de'i yang dag pa'is ba lags so//
279b8: ngaci'i srang dranan/ bcom ldan 'das togag pa dag gi la ba ni 'di la bu lags te/ lus dang dbang po dang / tshor ba dang / sems pa rnams ca 'di nyid la 'dag par mthong nas/ srid pa mas

280a1: sbyor ba la 'jug par mi bgyid cing / ma 'tshal bas ldongs par gyur pa skad de/ chad par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rtog ge bdag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la rmongs shing / sems kyi skad
280a2: cag 'jig pa la yang 'jug par mi bgyid la/ / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du yang ma gyur pa skad de/ rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtog ge bdag gi lta ba ni de lta bu dag
280a3: lags ba skad de/ de dag ni don de las thal ba'aska ba dang / don de'i tha chad kyi lta ba dang / gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang / 'dres pa'i lta bas chad par rlom sems bgyid pa dang / rtag par rlom
280a4: sems bgyid pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni zin pa'i phung po lnga po dag la phyin ci log par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes
280a5: ba dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen
280a6: pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sbyi ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams de
280a7: bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'jugs pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i sems can dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das byin ci lag tul
280a8: pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag pa

280b1: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gtsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
280b2: chos kyi skul de ltar mthong ba de dag ni/ yang dag pa mthong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las smras pa dang /
280b3: zhal nas skyes pa dang / chos las skyes pa dang / chos kyis sprul pa dang / chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
280b4: thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ 'di ltar shes pa dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni/ shes pa dag pa de'i spyod yul yang ma lags/ yul yang
280b5: ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa rton pa bzhi'i shes pa can dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing / yul ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
280b6: 'das theg pa gsum pa'o las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don de khong du chud par 'gyur zhing / don de rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rton pa bzhi bshad cing
280b7: btags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rton pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rton pa gcig za 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni/ rton pa thams cad kyi mchog
280b8: 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/ de ni yang dag par rton par bgyi ba dang / skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor pan rton pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs

281a1: pa'i snying po nyid kyi dbang du bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do zhes bshad cing btags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snying po mchis na 'khor ba zhes mchen ni
281a2: chog de rigs pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni/ zin padag gi dbang po rnams yo ma tu ni zhi nas na nga dzinas kyi// so nanas kyi dod/ skye ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos gnyis kyi sri
281a3: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gram zhes bgyi ba dang / skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad lags so// bcom ldan 'das gram zhes bgyi ba ni dbang
281a4: po 'gag pa 'di lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das skyes zhes bgyi ba de ni dbang po gsar ba rnams 'byung ba 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gum pa 'am/ 'pho
281a5: ba'am/ 'byung ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po na
281a6: rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni tha dad du mi gnas shing / 'brel la/ sbubs nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag
281a7: gi gzhi dang rten dang gnas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'brel ba ma mchis shing / tha dad du gnas la/ shes pa grol ba ma lags pa/ phyi rol kye 'dus byas
281a8: kyi chos rnams kyi gzhi dang rten dang gnas kyang lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du

281b1: gnyer ba dang / smon pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa drug po gang lags pa 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang / bcom ldan
281b2: 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang skad cig pa dang / sdug bsngal rnams myong ba ma lags pas chos de dag ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du
281b3: gnyer ba smon par mi rigs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa dang / mi skyo ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i chos cing / sdug bsngal myong
281b4: pa lags pas/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de ni sdug bsngal la yang skye ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon par 'os so// bcom ldan 'das
281b5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang dag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma lags/ gang zag ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sems can 'jig tshogs la
281b6: lta bar ldang ba dag dang phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang stong pa nyid las sems g.yengs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
281b7: 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lags so/ / chos kyi sku'i snying po lags so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi snying
281b8: po lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa/ glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te

282a1: bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam bdag bgyid do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i sems ni skad cig pa ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nyon mongs pa ma lags// bcom
282a2: ldan 'das mi dge ba'i sems kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems de yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems la
282a3: mi reg/ sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ji ltar sems mi reg pa'i chos can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i
282a4: nyon mongs pa yang mchis la/ sems nye bar nyon mongs pa yang mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par
282a5: dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan tu gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags// bcom
282a6: ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni rton pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng gi rtogs par dka' ba'i don bshad pa gsan nas/ rjes su
282a7: yi rang ba mdzad de/ / lha mo de de bzhin no// lha mo de de bzhin te/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni rtogs par dka'o// lha mo chos 'di gnyis ni rtogs par dka' ba
282a8: ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa rtogs par dka' ba dang / sems de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o// lha mo chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa ni khyod dam/ byang chub

282b1: sems dpa' ches chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag yin no/ / lha mo lhag ma nyan thos rnams ni chos 'di gnyis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro bar zad de/ lha mo nga'i nyan thos gang dag dad pa dang
282b2: ldan zhing / dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni/ dad pa'i snang ba la brtan nas/ chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mo chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni
282b3: lha mo dbang po'i rnam par rig pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnyid la rnam par lta ba dang / sems la dbang du
282b4: gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / bde ba la rnam par lta ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba ste/ lha mo rnam par lta ba'i rang
282b5: bzhin rnam par lnga la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan na/ lha mo da ltar dang / nga 'das pa'i 'og ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan zhing / dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dad pa'i sdang ba la
282b6: brten nas/ chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang / sems kyi nye bar nyon mongs pa la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mo de dag gi nges pa de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i
282b7: lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ lha mo de ltar na 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo mi spong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro ba la ni phan pa mang ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal
282b8: 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di la sman pa med pa'i don bshad pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

283a1: lha ma khyod spabs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang /
283a2: dag chos zab mo dag la ma smas ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so// gsum gang
283a3: zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa dang // bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos dang 'thun par sdud
283a4: pi'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos zab mo dag la// bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par 'tshal nas/ 'di ni bdag gis mi shes te/ don 'di
283a5: ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad do/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gtong par bgyid de/ sems rnam par gtong ba de dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gsum po
283a6: 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos zab mo dag la ma smas ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du skyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur
283a7: ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni/ chos zab mo dag la nan gyis mchog tu bzung nas/ go ba
283a8: lob kyi sems 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te/ ston par bgyid/ kun tu smra bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can dag/

283b1: bon rul ba lags te/ rgyal po'i thad du yang mchis la brlag par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa bon rul bar gyur pa de dag ni/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar/
283b2: gcad par bgyi ba lags so// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis de skad ces gsol nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga mo dpal 'phreng la 'di
283b3: skad ces legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo khyod kyis dus dang / skabs su chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid yang dag par bsung ba'i thabs kyi don bstan pa bshad pa dang / dam pa chos kyi dgra tshas cad
283b4: pi'i bshad pa legs so/ / legs so// lha mo khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum thag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin pas/ khyod kyis don bshad pa 'di la ngo mtshar che ba med do// de nas bcom
283b5: ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad nas/ ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor
283b6: bi'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan yod kyi/ grong khyer ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/ lta bas chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzums
283b7: bar lta bas/ / bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi slebs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ lha mo dpal 'phreng 'khor dang bcas pa/
283b8: mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu pa'i bzhin dang ldan pas/ gcig gis gcig gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags shing / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid

284a1: la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du/ grong khyer 'thab med du dong ngo // de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis rang gi khyim thab rgyal po grags pi'i bshes gnyen theg pa chen po la nges par bcug go// grong khyer
284a2: chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud do/ / rgyal po zags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa
284a3: yan chad/ thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/ de ltar grong khyer ba thams cad theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te/
284a4: nang du gshegs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal cing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la yang dgongs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs
284a5: kyis yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya
284a6: cher yang dag par bstan te/ ko'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung shig/ ke'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la shod cig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis
284a7: kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig/ de nas bcom
284a8: ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

284b1: na na namatha sa pa na/ / Ak+Sha / nga/ sa da/ mas smra
284b2: ba ba 'am/ nye bar brtag par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis kA tsaM smos// kau'u shi ka de ltar na/ chos kyi na mgrangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no// ko ru shi ka
284b3: dang phyir chos kyi rnamathang sa 'dir yin tan ma meng yangs su brjod pa nam ga pashad kyis/ de legs par rab tu rtson la yi la bang shig dang / ngas spyod la bag // t+ta/
284b4: dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gas so logs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhur nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka 'di ni
284b5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ ko'u shi ka 'di ni yi dam chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ smon lam thams cad srud
284b6: pa smon lam chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba bstan pa zhes bya bar
284b7: yang zung shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa brgyad bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ chos kyi sku bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung
284b8: shig/ stong pa nyid kyi don gyi dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bden pa gcig bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rtag pa dang brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa

285a1: dang / skyabs gcig tu gyur pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ phyin ci log gis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems la dgongs pa bstan pa
285a2: zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi yang dag pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kau'u shi ka 'di ni lha mo dpal 'phyeng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kau'u shika mdo
285a3: 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu ba bcad pa dang / nges pa'i don dang / rton pa gcig pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kau'u shi ka lha mo dpal 'phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam
285a4: grangs 'di ni ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis/ 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig/ ston cig/ lha'i dbang po brgya
285a5: byin gyis bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhing / kun chub par byas nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa
285a6: kun dga' bo dang / gzhan yang gang der 'dus par gyur pa dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa stod do//
285a7: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ dpal 'phreng gis zhus pi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho/
285a8: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bA sa pa ri brid ts+tsha/ nA ma ma hA yAn mu tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams

285b1: cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi 'gram/ brgal bar bya ba ma yin pa/ khu brug dang / ne tse dang / bung pa dang / dad pa'i rgyal po dang
285b2: bya'i tshogs dumas+tha snyan pa 'byin pa/ / shing thag sha dang / n+ya grod dang / tsan dan dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / sa la ki'i yalags bskyabs pa/ rtag tu me tog dri zhim po'i sil ma bkram pa de ni/ dge slong
285b3: gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rdul zad pa/ chos las mi zlogs pa/ bsam gtan dang / kha ton la gnas pa/ 'chags dang / khri'i
285b4: steng na 'dug pa/ dang ba'i rgyal po ltar sa phyogs de mdzes par byed pa sha stag la/ kha cig ni nang du yang dag 'jog pa la gnas pa/ kha cig ni shing drung na gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
285b5: bka' kun 'gro bar byed pa/ cha byad dul zhing brtan pa/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ 'dod pa la 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / le lo dang bral ba/ sha stag dang
285b6: thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbyin pa byin cig/ bya ba gang yin pa gyis shig/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams
285b7: shing / dbang po sbas la yid zhi bar gnas par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo da/ 'od srung chen po dang / sha ri'i bu dang /
285b8: bkul dang / nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau'u di nA dang / de dag la stsogs pa nyan thos chen po sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar

286a1: 9/ mam da/ na / ka/ da / bdun dza/ / stsa nan
286a2: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs logs na 'bar zhing snang ba zhugs kyi 'od zer la bu gda' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa /
286a3: dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo 'di ni dri nag ming bu drang srong 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ drang srong rnams kyi mchog/ drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya ste/ drang srong
286a4: dga' thub drag po la gnas pa/ bsnyen par gnas pa/ brgya stong gis drab pa/ lus kyi mdzes pa med pa lnga brgya tsam bye bzhin du 'brang ba la/ drang srong dkar min zhon nu dang / me lha dang / rnam par brda
286a5: srung gi bu dang / ri dgas mo'i bu dang / sgra byed kyi bu dang / bur bran dang / me'i bu dang / rnam par ko'i bu dang / bsnyen par dka' dang / de dag la sogs pas yongs su bskor nas rjes su 'chag pa'o// de nas de'i bar
286a6: skabs su rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ bsam gtan gyi dben pa la dgyes pa/ shing ljon pa sdug pa'i nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
286a7: mthong nas kyang rgyas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ skye ma'o mal ngo mtshar te/ 'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ byin tsa ma log pa gsung bzhes 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas yin no// ji ltar
